local_intent: Approach and precisely align to the computed grasp pose for the grape cluster, retrying once if alignment fails, then verify arrival at the target pose.
assumptions: grasp_grape pose already computed and available on blackboard
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase using the same target, tolerance (0.005), and timeout (1200 ms) as the global tree, positioned between pregrasp positioning and contact. Adds a single retry consistent with the failure-and-recovery policy for misalignment.
